title: Nearly 200 Great Barrier Reef coral species also live in the deep sea
desc: There are more coral species lurking in the deep ocean that previously thought.
author: Jake Bittle

title: East Antarctica's glaciers are stirring
desc: Nasa says it has detected the first signs of significant melting in a swathe of glaciers in East Antarctica.
author: Jake Bittle

title: 50 years ago, armadillos hinted that DNA wasn’t destiny
desc: Nasa says it has detected the first signs of significant melting in a swathe of glaciers in East Antarctica.
author: Jake Bittle
